Houston.Benji's Special Educational Academy: Benji's Special Educational Academy Independent School District (or Benji's Academy Charter School) is a state charter school with two campuses (including Benji's II) in the Northside district of Houston, Texas, near the Fifth Ward. The school covered grades Pre-Kindergarten 4-12. As of 2010 the school is defying an order to close from the Texas Education Agency.
